character_vault.name: Raj
character_vault.description: Male, 28 years old, South Asian, average build, average, average, medium brown skin, short black straight messy hair, brown almond eyes, thick eyebrows, medium nose, full lips, black stubble (light stubble), wearing pale blue button-down shirt (fitted fit, long sleeves, collar neck), dark blue jeans (regular fit, full length), black black sneakers (casual), contemplative, casual style, urban professional aesthetic , high quality , detailed character design , consistent style , professional illustration headshot , head and shoulders view

notes: Age 28 could be classed as young_adult or adult; chose young_adult.
Interpreted "black stubble (light stubble)" as light-density black stubble.
Non-face details (clothing, style notes) omitted per face-centric focus.

character_vault.name: Yamraj

notes: Age unknown in description; adult chosen as best fit
Depicted as a deity; classified as fantasy
No explicit facial marks or scars mentioned
